item.title: DarsUp
item.description: DarsUp is a new generation of universities. In todayâ€™s busy world you cannot always adjust your schedule to pursue a full time education. Online learning enables you to study for an internationally recognised qualification without making your life hard. Whether you are a graduated person wanting to start your career without sacrificing your education or a busy professional looking for the next career step, online study is the best solution for you.

item.title: My Resume
item.description: About Over 9 Years of experience in Analysis, Design, Development, Management, and Implementation of various standalone and client-server enterprise application software with Domain-driven design methodology Experience in writing REST APIs with Python and Django for large-scale applications with microservices architecture Excellent working experience as technical lead in Agile (SCRUM) team with the high quality delivered on-time projects Expertise in Object-Oriented concepts like SOLID, GRASP, Encapsulation, Overloading, and Overriding Experiences (9 yr 6 mos) Senior Python Developer and Software Architect (Technical Lead)
